trustfund:
TF030682-CANADA GENERAL CTF FY05: AFRICA
            - TRANSPORT SECTOR AND ENERGY AND MININ

abstracts.cdata!:
The Post Reunification Economic Recovery
            Credit (PRERC) Project provides overall support to the
            Government of the for the Democratic Republic of the
            Congo's economic program for sustainable growth and
            poverty reduction. It has one cross-sectoral first tranche;
            and three floating sectoral tranches, which support reforms
            in civil service retirement, in resolution of internal debt,
            and in centralized payment of government public utilities
            bills.  All conditions for the release of the civil service
            retirement and internal debt tranches of the PRERC have been
            met and the tranches have been made available for
            disbursement.  Overall execution of the Government's
            economic program is satisfactory, and the macroeconomic
            framework is consistent with the objectives of the program.
